Sentencas: In this paper, we present results on performance characterization of solid-oxide fuel cell stacks at elevated pressures up to 6 bar,.
Titulo: Performance characterization of metal-supported solid-oxide fuel cell stacks at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Stacks are designed and built by Ceres Power, Ltd., and are rated at 1-and 5-kWe.
Titulo: Performance characterization of metal-supported solid-oxide fuel cell stacks at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Fuel streams include H2/N2 mixtures, synthetic natural-gas reformate, and simulated anode tail-gas recycle.
Titulo: Performance characterization of metal-supported solid-oxide fuel cell stacks at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Elevated operating pressure serves to increase stack electrochemical performance, with the most-pronounced gains found up to 4 bar,.
Titulo: Performance characterization of metal-supported solid-oxide fuel cell stacks at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Pressurized operation reduces the extent of methane conversion, promoting more-uniform internal reforming and cooling within the stack.
Titulo: Performance characterization of metal-supported solid-oxide fuel cell stacks at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Such cooling is critical at higher-current conditions.
Titulo: Performance characterization of metal-supported solid-oxide fuel cell stacks at elevated pressure

Sentencas: A previously developed one-dimensional computational stack model is used to provide insight into stack operation.
Titulo: Performance characterization of metal-supported solid-oxide fuel cell stacks at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Pressurization is found to slightly increase internal thermal gradients, while promoting more-uniform reactant-concentration profiles across the cell, reducing the likelihood of local fuel starvation.
Titulo: Performance characterization of metal-supported solid-oxide fuel cell stacks at elevated pressure

Sentencas: The high fuel dilution brought by anode recycle can modestly decrease stack performance; however, this decrease is recovered through elevated-pressure operation at 3 bar,.
Titulo: Performance characterization of metal-supported solid-oxide fuel cell stacks at elevated pressure

Sentencas: Anode recycle further promotes compositional uniformity across the cell.
Titulo: Performance characterization of metal-supported solid-oxide fuel cell stacks at elevated pressure

Sentencas: These results reflect that pressurized operation can promote stack performance, while potentially promoting long-term stack durability through uniformity in stack environmental conditions.
Titulo: Performance characterization of metal-supported solid-oxide fuel cell stacks at elevated pressure
